law.catch_line: Inducement of false report by weighman prohibited.
law.text: No warehouseman shall attempt by any means to influence a weighman to report falsely the weight of any tobacco sold on the floor of his warehouse.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4814c-18.
